Text.Page:
These undead are everywhere. I don't know whether they came from the north, whether they're working for the argons, or what.

But I do know this: I want them gone!

Start with the {@LinkCreature:4#1061#devan dark knights} and {@LinkCreature:4#1062#risen devan infantry}. Gather their tokens, too. I'm collecting them.
That's one fewer thing to worry about, <PCNAME>. Keep fighting the good fight.
C'mon, they aren't so tough. They're just bones...and armor...and hideous weapons. Just go kill them already!
